name: Family Electric Rate Assistance (FERA)
description: PG&E offers many programs that can help you save money and energy. The following programs are available to help with gas and electricity costs. Services: California Alternate Rates for Energy (CARE) Program, Family Electric Rate Assistance (FERA) Program, Medical Baseline Program, Vulnerable Customer Status, Arrearage Management Plan (AMP), Relief for Energy Assistance through Community Help (REACH) Program, Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP), Energy Savings Assistance (ESA) prog
